alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 2:30AM PST until December 11 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow from the first of two storms will taper off early this morning. Snow from the second storm will begin late today and continue through Sunday morning. Accumulations from the second storm of 6 to 12 inches are possible, with up to 18 inches over the mountains. * WHERE...Baker County zone. * WHEN...From late this afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
